results.title: Sur mer et sur terre etc.
results.brief_description: Five French language programmes taken in location in and arround Fecamp and Potiers: 1. “Sur mer et sur terre”. 2. “Par les rues”. 3. “Chemin faisant”. 4. “Ecole, travail, familie”. 5. Loisirs”.

results.title: Rendez-vous France. Episodes 1-5
results.creator_credit: Sue Weeks, Susan Paton and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: A series of five french language programs based on the adventures of the Keravec family on holiday in Cancale, Brittany. Provides elementary french language and gives an insight into many aspects of life in France. The individual titles indicate the content of each program: “Chez Keravec”, “Les surprises” “Une ombre du passe”, “Les choux-fleurs de Saint-Brieuc”, “La chasse a mort”.

results.title: Treffpunkt Deutschland. Episodes 1-5
results.creator_credit: John Thomas, John Billingham and BBC
results.brief_description: A compilation tape of five programmes designed to help students in their second or third year of learning German. The programmes are built around everyday experiences of some German teenagers and are entirely in German. A simple linking commentary repeats and reinforces the most useful language used. Individual titles indicate content of each program.

results.title: ICRC 1983
results.creator_credit: International Committee of the Red Cross
results.brief_description: Provides an overview of the work that was carried out world wide by the Red Cross in 1983. Shows volunteers and delegates at work in Africa, Poland, Middle East, Thailand, South America and Granada.

results.title: Delegates
results.creator_credit: Derek Hart and Derek Hart Productions
results.brief_description: Shows Red Cross delegates in action in Lebanon. The role of the delegates is clearly portrayed as they visit families to discover their needs and distribute aid, act as mediators in tricky and often dangerous situations and to generally bring about peace and reduce human suffering

results.title: No turning back (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Depicts the process of training guide dogs for the blind by following the training of Michael Waldock and his dog. In 1984 Michael was awarded the Young Australian of the Year Award for his maning of the emergency coast guard on CB radio.

results.title: Surrounded: peer group membership
results.brief_description: Looks at the situation of two members of an adolescent group who each for different reasons does not wish to attend a weekend holiday with the others. Shows how they handle the pressure exerted on them by the other members of the group to conform. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.

results.title: South with Shackleton (1914)
results.creator_credit: Richard Robinson and British Broadcasting Corporation
results.brief_description: Follows the trials and tribulations of the unsuccessful exploration team of Sir Ernest Shackleton which set off from South America aboard the “Endurance” to sail to the Antarctic via South Georgia Island. After 9 weeks at sea, the ship was caught by an ice pack and frozen in. Uses archival footage, comments by surviving team members and original film footage taken by Frank Hurley. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
results.description: Follows the trials and tribulations of the unsuccessful exploration team of Sir Ernest Shackleton which set off from South America aboard the “Endurance” to sail to the Antarctic via South Georgia Island. After 9 weeks at sea, the ship was caught by an ice pack and frozen in. Uses archival footage, comments by surviving team members and original film footage taken by Frank Hurley. results.title: Luchak's Easter
results.creator_credit: Robert Klymasz, National Film Board of Canada and National Museum of Man
results.brief_description: A Ukrainian Easter tradition is celebrated by a Ukrainian-Canadian family in Alberta. Coinciding with the time of Christ’s Resurrection, ceremonies are held in anticipation of the resurrection of those ancestors who have died. The family graveyard is decorated, religious rites are performed, and a family feast is held.
